description:
Tweedie families, designed for use with gam from the mgcv library.
Restricted to variance function powers between 1 and 2. A useful alternative to quasi when a
full likelihood is desirable. Tweedie is for use with fixed p. tw is for use when p
is to be estimated during fitting. For fixed p between 1 and 2 the Tweedie is an exponential family 
distribution with variance given by the mean to the power p.
